articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Meta cuts prices for the Quest 2 headset and accessories - TechCrunch
articles.description: Months after Meta launched its Quest 3 headset, the company is slashing prices for its older Quest 2 headset by $50 permanently.
articles.content:
Months after Meta launched its Quest 3 headset, the company is slashing prices for its older Quest 2 headset by $50.
The 128GB version drops from $299 to $249 and the 256GB version drops from $349 t… [+1048 chars]
